mapper.select: SELECT r.r_id as rId, r.m_id as mId, r.o_id as oId, r.r_contents as contents, r.r_regdate as regDate, r.r_score as score, r.r_is_maintain as isMaintain, r.r_retention_period as retentionPeriod FROM REVIEW r JOIN ORDERS o ON r.o_id = o.o_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON o.pd_id = p.pd_id WHERE p.pd_id = #{pdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW( m_id, o_id, r_contents, r_regdate, r_score, r_is_maintain) VALUES (1, 10, #{contents}, now(), #{score}, 0)
